io.micronaut.jackson.core.tree

Class JsonNodeTreeCodec

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.jackson.core.tree.JsonNodeTreeCodec

  • public final class JsonNodeTreeCodec
extends Object
    Codec for transforming JsonNode from and to json streams.
    Since:
    3.1
    Author:
    Jonas Konrad
